    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Spreganje glagola</string>
            <string language="en">Conjugation of verb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konjugation des Verbs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conjugaison de verbe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conjugation do verbo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Coniugazione del verbo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κλίση του ρήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjugación del verbo</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Tabelo je moč uporabiti pri vaji, preverjanju znanja iz spreganja glagola. Za pomoč pri spreganju imajo navedene tudi os. zaim.</string>
            <string language="en">Table that can be used as a exercise or exam when teaching conjugation of verb.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">spreganje</string>
            <string language="en">conjugation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">glagol</string>
            <string language="en">verb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slovenščina</string>
            <string language="en">slovene</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Legen Sie ver, das als Übung oder Prüfung 
verwendet werden kann, wenn man Konjugation des Verbs unterrichtet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ajournez qui peut être utilisé comme exercice 
ou examen en enseignant la conjugaison du verbe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tabele que pode ser usado como um exercício ou 
um exam ao ensinar o conjugation do verbo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Posponga che può essere usato come 
un'esercitazione o exam quando insegna la coniugazione del verbo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πίνακας που μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση ή 
διαγωνισμός κατά τη διδασκαλία της κλίσης του ρήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tabule que se puede utilizar como un ejercicio o 
examen al enseñar la conjugación del verbo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konjugation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
